issue.message: TypedArrayUtils.getAttr can only be called from within the same library group prefix (referenced groupId=`androidx.core` with prefix androidx from groupId=`Freebloks-Android`)
issue.errorLine1: @Keep constructor(context: Context, attrs: AttributeSet?) : this(context, attrs, TypedArrayUtils.getAttr(context, androidx.preference.R.attr.checkBoxPreferenceStyle, android.R.attr.checkBoxPreferenceStyle))
